string-array.item: Tracking your habits to help deliver the best accuracy for recommendations.
Mark the best recipes as your favorites to make them much easier to find.
Make sure to login and track stats daily to keep track of eating and workout trends.
In your profile tab, you can set your baseline habits to compare your current trends with.
There are many recipes to try, make sure you use the search feature to find new ones.
